programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: Theres no question about it: with a Grammy for Best Latin Jazz Album for her recording Made In Brazil, seven previous Grammy nominations, four Gold Disc Awards, and three "Best Vocal Album Awards" in Japan, Eliane Elias has taken her place in the pantheon of music giants. In her projects, Elias wears many hats: she serves as producer, composer, lyricist, arranger, pianist, and vocalist. In this concert broadcast, recorded live at the Philharmonie in Munich, Elias shows her distinctive and immediately recognizable musical style, which blends her Brazilian samba roots and her sensuous, alluring voice with her impressive instrumental bebop, jazz, classical, and compositional skills. She is an artist beyond category, and in this concert she performs with Jay Randall Anderson (bass) and Adam Nussbaum (drums).

programme.title: Selah Sue @ Festival Culturebox
programme.desc: Belgian singer-songwriter Selah Sue performed at La Cigale in Paris as part of the digital Culturebox Festival 2020. The singer released her million-selling debut album "Selah Sue" in March 2011, featuring her popular single "Raggamuffin" and her duet "Please" with American hip-hop artist Cee Lo Green. Months after its release, Selah was presented with a European Border Breakers Award (EBBA), for her cross-border success. At La Cigale in 2020, Selah Sue is accompanied by Joachim Saerens on keyboard and Simon Lenski on cello, opening her concert with a jazzed-up So This Is Love, a romantic ballad from Walt Disneys film Cinderella.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Whatever
programme.desc: In 1988, Dee Dee Bridgewater was one of the first great jazz singers to perform at the Jazz Festival in Ramatuelle. In 2016, the story seems to repeat itself as her daughter China Moses took the stage at Ramatuelle. Over the years, China Moses has become a mature performer with a unique style: rocky voice, sharp sense of swing, and intense/energetic stage presence. After signing compilations dedicated to Dinah Washington and blues, Moses released in 2016 an album of his own compositions, entitled "Whatever". Get ready for a most entertaining performance combining jazz, soul, and hip-hop.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Lucibela, comes from the island of Sao Nicolau. Her assured, warm voice is shaped by years of assimilation to the sounds of morna and coladeira.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Belgian-Japanese piano wizard Alex Koo. In his brand new Etudes for Piano, composed for and commissioned by BOZAR Brussels, he shows how his passion for jazz and classical music merge perfectly, like a marriage between Debussy, Chopin, Reich, and Rachmaninov on the one hand, and Keith Jarrett, Craig Taborn, Brian Eno, and Philip Glass on the other.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2024 - Liv Andrea Hauge Trio
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2024, jazzahead! paid special attention to the jazz scene of the Netherlands and invited over forty jazz acts to perform over the course of three days. Among the ensembles presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2024 is the Liv Andrea Hauge Trio. Hauge, who is originally from Northern Norway and now based in Oslo, writes compositions that emphasize groove, straightforward and catchy motifs, and dynamic interplay. Her music blends playfulness with a touch of melancholy, providing ample space for improvisation. This is also evident in a commission of a large-scale piece for a trio, three vocalists, and a full symphony orchestra on the occasion of the inauguration of Bodø24 as European capital of culture. At jazzahead! 2024, Liv Andrea Hauge (piano) appears with Georgia Wartel Collins (bass) and August Glannestrand (drums).

programme.title: Jazzed Out Tokyo
programme.sub-title: Kyoto Jazz Massive, Sleep Walker, Quasimode
programme.desc: Jazzed Out proves that a jazz session can take place anywhere. Unusual locations, such as garage buildings, multi-storey car parks, street corners, subway trains, and parks, in several of the worlds metropoles, provide the setting for brief jazz performances. The sheer rawness of the metropoles merge with the musical creations of various artists in search of the perfect urban stage. In this episode, Tokyo serves as a backdrop for sets by Kyoto Jazz Massive, Sleep Walker, and Quasimode.

programme.title: Sammy Davis Jr. - Concertgebouw Amsterdam
programme.desc: The Royal Concertgebouw in Amsterdam is a world-renowned concert hall, known for its first-rate acoustics. It has attracted many famous performers over the years and is one of the Netherlands most treasured musical institutions. On May 28, 1967, American singer and actor Sammy Davis Jr. appeared at the Concertgebouw in Amsterdam for a live, nationwide TV broadcast. Supported by his band conducted by George Rhodes, Davis Jr. combined his singing talent and infectious sense of humor as he covered songs from a variety of genres.

programme.title: Schloss Ansbach
programme.desc: Harmolodics, the musical philosophy of jazz saxophonist Ornette Coleman, is associated primarily with avant-garde jazz and the free jazz movement, although its implications extend beyond these limits. Coleman defined "harmolodics" as "the use of the physical and the mental of ones own logic made into an expression of sound to bring about the musical sensation of unison executed by a single person or with a group". Applied to the particulars of music, this means that harmony, melody, speed, rhythm, time and phrases all have equal position in the results that come from the placing and spacing of ideas - as evidenced in this broadcast of a performance by the Ornette Coleman Sextet.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Ladama, is a quintet of women multi-instrumentalists from Venezuela, Brazil, Colombia and the United States who not only perform as a touring band, but also strive to engage youth in their respective communities in the process of musicmaking, composition and audio production through collaboration and performance workshops. Ladama is a positive force in times urgently in need of tolerance and communication.

programme.title: Agnes Gosling Quartet - InJazz 2019
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Agnes Gosling. She has matured as a writer and arranger. The vocalist is unafraid to show her vulnerability. With her quartet, Gosling honors the tradition of great acoustic jazz while exploring new sounds and styles from the contemporary music world.

programme.title: Louis Armstrong
programme.desc: Following a highly successful small-group jazz concert at New York Town Hall on May 17, 1947, Armstrongs manager Joe Glaser dissolved the Armstrong big band on August 13, 1947 and established a six-piece small group. This group was called the All Stars, and in 1964 Louis Armstrong recorded his biggest-selling record, Hello, Dolly! He made assorted television appearances, especially in the 1950s and 1960s - the recorded film was a TV Show in Australia when Armstrong was at the peak of his career. Armstrong kept up his busy tour schedule until a few years before his death in 1971. He also toured Africa, Europe, and Asia under sponsorship of the US State Department with great success, earning the nickname Ambassador Satch.

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Archive
programme.desc: The world-renowned North Sea Jazz Festival features a wide variety of genres, including traditional New Orleans jazz, swing, bop, free jazz, fusion, avant-garde and electronic jazz, blues, gospel, funk, soul, RandB, hip hop, world beat and Latin. The festival was founded by entrepreneur and jazz fan Paul Acket, who sold his highly successful pop magazine publishing house to organize and fund the first edition of the festival in 1976. This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the great Wayne Shorter Quartet. Shorters maxim is to reinvent his music during each concert. He means to give his music a radical originality.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Aretha Franklin
programme.sub-title: Aretha Franklin: A trip in Paris
programme.desc: Live Recording at the Palais Des Sports from 1977. Aretha Franklin performs songs like Respect, You make me feel like a natural woman, "La vie en Rose" and Singing in the Rain.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: Live at the Office
programme.sub-title: Live at the Office: BIGYUKI and Now vs Now
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe and restaurant with a live music programme thats deeply rooted in jazz, and also branches out towards soul, funk, hip-hop and electronic music as well. Its name "BIRD" refers to the nickname of the legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker (1920-1955). BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, good wines, no-nonsense beers and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and Stingray DJAZZ have been collaborating for a series of music programmes: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from the first row! This episode is a fantastic special live recorded in the BIRD office with BIGYUKI and Now Vs. Now.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1982, vocalese maestro Jon Hendricks brought his wife Judith Hendricks, daughter Michelle Hendricks and mouth trumpeter Bob Gurland to perform at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. Accompanying them are pianist Michael Weiss, bassist Murray Wall and drummer Marvin Smith as they cover classics by Duke Ellington and Count Basie.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller - Extensions
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomerys virtuosity as he performs the captivating "Nicas Dream" in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of "Heres That Rainy Day", recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Passs "You Stepped Out of a Dream" and "You Turned The Tables on Me", recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform "Extensions" in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Halls lyrical solo performance of "Im Getting Sentimental Over You" from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrocks avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of "Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of "Memphis Underground" from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: Hackensack
programme.desc: Explore the music of one of the most influential and innovative saxophonists in jazz history: John Coltrane! Immerse yourself in this collection of remarkable performances from the early 1960s that showcase Coltranes unparalleled artistry and unique sound during a transformative period in the artists career. Recorded in various European cities, Coltrane is seen playing the songs "Autumn Leaves", "Hackensack", "My Favorite Things", "I Want To Talk About You", "Vigil", and "Naima". Tune in and experience why the music of John Coltrane has touched the lives of so many!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Brothers Four
programme.sub-title: The Brothers Four: Live in Comblain-la-Tour
programme.desc: Pioneering folk/pop quartet The Brothers Four was formed in 1957 by University of Washington fraternity brothers Bob Flick (upright bass, vocals), Mike Kirkland (guitar, banjo, vocals), John Paine (guitar, vocals) and Richard Foley (guitar, vocals). Their consistently smooth, warm, and lush harmonies set The Brothers Four apart from others. They turned professional as a result of a practical joke. A member of a competing fraternity arranged for a woman to telephone the band members, identifying herself as the secretary to the manager of Seattles Colony Club and inviting the quartet down for an audition. As soon as The Brothers Four got there, they found that there was no invitation or any audition scheduled - but since they were there anyway, the club manager asked them to play a few songs and ended up hiring them. A few years later, The Brothers Four appeared at a short-lived Belgian jazz festival in Comblain-la-Tour, where they sang the entire book of American Folk Songs.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch jazzband BRUUT led by saxophone player Maarten Hoogenhuis!

programme.title: Wynton in the South Bank Show
programme.desc: Considered one of the most technically brilliant players in the history of the trumpet, jazz musician Wynton Marsalis is also a master of classical music and a fine composer. Marsalis takes the cameras with him around New York, to his home town of New Orleans, and to his rehearsal studios where he and his assembled band of musicians are seen putting together the album Blood on the Fields. He also talks about his music and his way of working.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.sub-title: McCoy Tyner Trio and Ravi Coltrane
programme.desc: "Jazz a Vienne" is one of the worlds most prestigious jazz festivals. Ever since 1981 it has attracted leading jazz artists, with many of them playing return engagements. Unsurprisingly, the festivals 2012 edition did not fall short of expectations: the line up was filled with the biggest names in music. Among them was the legendary pianist McCoy Tyner. Tyner has become one of the most influential pianists in jazz history. During the first half of the 1960s, Tyner was part of the classic John Coltrane Quartet. As such, Tyners playing supported the iconic saxophonists ventures into his spiritual quests. Joined on stage by Coltranes son Ravi, with Gerald Cannon on double bass and Montez Coleman on drums, Tyner treats the festivals audience to an impressive performance.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: Kurt Rosenwinkel meets Peter Beets Trio
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Live at A to JazZ Festival
programme.sub-title: Live at A to JazZ Festival: Sofia
programme.desc: Live at A to JazZ Festival, Sofia - In 2019, the vibrant city of Sofia, Bulgaria, hosted the International A to JazZ Festival. Among the featured acts was the trailblazing jazz trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah. This genre-defying artist captivated the audience with his eclectic "stretch music"; an approach that incorporates hip-hop and reaches back through the American canon into African percussion and its rich melodic content. Trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuahs quintet, which includes drummer Corey Fonville, percussionist Weedie Braimah, pianist Lawrence Fields, and bass guitarist Max Mucha, delivered a performance that defied boundaries and expectations.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Playa del Carmen
programme.desc: This broadcast shows a rare appearance at the 1996 Germeringer Jazztage by the legendary flamenco guitarist Paco de Lucía and his sextet. Some may question the inclusion of a flamenco guitarist within a jazz festival. However, the similarities between flamenco and blues have been well documented: both are the outlet for a poor, disenfranchised minority, with a primitive strength, boundless capabilities for improvisation and a requirement for breathtaking virtuosity - all qualities shown by Paco de Lucía in this performance. Moreover, he has long been experimenting with jazz forms (evident even from his inclusion of bass, drums, and saxophone in his sextet), while still retaining the essence of the flamenco tradition. In his own words: "What I have tried to do is have a hand holding onto tradition and the other scratching, digging in other places trying to find new things I can bring into flamenco".

programme.title: Stingray PausePlay
programme.desc: We Pause and chat with local and international artists to get an in-depth look at their lives and music, they Play some amazing music in these, one-of-a-kind, live sessions! These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: 29th Street Saxophone Quartet
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The 29th Street Saxophone Quartet is an American quartet founded in 1982 by alto saxophonists Bobby Watson and Ed Jackson, tenor saxophonist Rich Rothenberg and baritone saxophonist Jim Hartog. The band has an eclectic repertoire ranging from jazz to show, funk, rap, and experimental music.

programme.title: Travellin Blues
programme.desc: Jazz en Baie, a whining guitar sound, and the baritone voice of Big Daddy Wilson are the perfect recipe for an emotional and melancholy blues concert. As a young man, Big Daddy Wilson never saw a real blues concert before he walked into a Bremen club as a young soldier. This revelation drove the expatriate to throw himself head over heals into music. A few decades and a couple of studio albums later, hes well-known as one of the greatest contemporary bluesmen: his baritone voice, of a rare emotional power, recounts the nostalgic stories of his native land. His album Im Your Man brought him his first international success. Always respectful of the blues roots he inherited, the charismatic singer adds soul, funk, country and gospel to his musical range; the memories of his American youth.

programme.title: The making of Omara
programme.desc: Join us for an insightful look at the creative process of saxophonist Michael Blicher, organist Dan Hemmer, and drummer Steve Gadd as they craft the repertoire for their acclaimed 2016 album "Omara." Following in the footsteps of legendary organists like Jimmy Smith, Shirley Scott, and Jimmy McGriff, organist Dan Hemmer and his two musical peers prove that the organ trio format continues to be a force to be reckoned with in jazz and beyond. The album "Omara," recorded live during their 2016 tour of Germany, England and Denmark, captures the trios unique blend of jazz, soul, and blues in performance at some of Europes most intimate jazz clubs. Witness the passion, dedication, and inspiration that led to this wonderful album in Blicher Hemmer Gadd - The Making of "Omara".

programme.title: For Heavens Sake
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1968, two former colleagues met again on stage, this time leading their own bands at the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam: drummer Art Blakey and pianist Horace Silver were both co-founders of The Jazz Messengers.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Runtown - La Machine de Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Enjoy Runtowns first concert in Paris, where the Nigerian superstar brings many guests to his show. One of the most talented Nigerian afrobeat scenes will make you rediscover his greatest hits. Nigeria is a very creative country when it comes to the music scene. Runtown is no exception. His first single, "Party Like Its 1980," paved the way for "Gallardo," which caught the entire international scenes attention. Runtowns inspiration comes from the greats, from Salif Keita and Fela Kuti to Otis Redding and Bob Marley. An exceptional event not to be missed.

programme.title: Portrait of Maria Ana Bobone
programme.desc: Maria Ana Bobone (Portugal) is one of the best fado singers of her generation. She started singing fado when she was 16. Her debut album is called "Alma Nova" and marked the beginning of her amazing career. For the recordings of her next two albums, "Luz Destino" and "Senhora da Lapa" Maria Ana welcomed instruments that are usually not present in fado music: the harpsichord and saxophone. After that, she continued her career with the release of Nome de Mar, which received many positive reviews. At the moment, Maria Ana is performing at all Portugals major venues, as well as many festivals and concert halls throughout the world, with the aim to present fado music and Portuguese culture to other cultures. Bobones latest album, Fado and Piano, shows her diversity as an artist, composer and arranger. By including the piano she re-innovates the tradition of the early 20th century. This portrait shows Maria Anas performances and interviews in which she explains her passion for fado music and culture.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. Saxophonist Ben Sluijs and pianist Erik Vermeulen both had a classical training. Both musicians have a strong melodic and harmonic approach. Their music offers no room for showing off: its all about the music itself. Sluijss fascination for jazz grew after he graduated cum laude. This led to him taking lessons with David Liebman in the US. His colleague, Erik Vermeulen, entered the Belgian jazz scene at age 22, playing with his trio. He performed with international stars such as Clark Terry, Joe Lovano, Steve Grossman, Art Farmer, Bob Mover, Toots Thielemans, and Michael Moore. This MotorMusic episode shows the fruits of this inspiring collaboration between these two classically-trained jazz musicians.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.sub-title: H. Jones, J. Woode, C. Lucas
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1986, an alto sax choir consisting of Bob Wilber, Marshall Royal, Piet Noordijk, Lee Konitz, Sonny Fortune, Julius Hemphill, Carlos Ward, Richie Cole, and Paquito DRivera performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. They were accompanied by a rhythm section of the decorated pianist and bandleader Hank Jones, bassist Jimmy Woode and drummer Clyde Lucas.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.sub-title: Arturo Sandoval And His Band from Cuba
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1986, Cuban trumpeter Arturo Sandoval brought his band with him to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. Featuring talented performers like pianist Hilario Durán and guitarist Jorge Chicoy, they displayed a master class in Latin jazz fusion.

programme.title: Nos barracos da cidade
programme.desc: Brazilian artist Gilberto Gil returns to Jazz à Vienne in France with a new round of singing that is inspired by his latest album Fe na Festa: a mixture of celebration, tradition and even some rock now and then. Gilberto Gil, worldwide known for as musician and the Brazilian minister of Culture, was one of the pioneers of the cultural movement tropicalismo. This movement, with a strong character of social protest, combines elements of traditional Brazilian culture with modern art forms. Gilberto Gils new sound clearly has its roots in Brazilian culture, yet it is always inspired by jazz.

programme.title: Up Above My Head
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned artists. The talented American singer Michelle David performs pop and gospel music that feeds the heart and soothes the soul. Having grown up with the church, she started singing at the age of four. A year later she joined her first band, The Mission of Love. In 1980 she enrolled at Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts in New York City, known from the film Fame. During this time, she appeared as an extra in the legendary comedy film Ghostbusters. Musicals and tours with the bands of Diana Ross and Michael Bolton followed.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64
programme.sub-title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64: The Divine One
programme.desc: Sarah Vaughan: Live in 58 and 64 features the "Divine One" in her prime, wrapping her sultry voice around jazz standards such as Lover Man, "Misty" and "I Got Rhythm" and soaring on popular showtunes such as "Over The Rainbow" and Maria. One of the greatest voices of the 20th Century, her renditions of songs by Harold Arlen, Leonard Bernstein, Johnny Burke, the Gershwins and Stephen Sondheim are pure diva magic. These three performances demonstrate why Sarah Vaughan is invariably mentioned in the same breath as Ella Fitzgerald and Billie Holiday.

programme.title: Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames
programme.desc: Georgie Fame, known for "Yeh, Yeh" and "The Ballad of Bonnie and Clyde" makes a triumphant comeback with The Blue Flames. Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames was a popular band in the UK in the 60s, celebrated for its RandB, soul, jazz, ska, and pop sounds. The training was largely inspired by ska, a popular musical style in Jamaican cafes in London at the time. It was the song "Green Onions" from the Booker T and The MG that inspired Georgie to incorporate the Hammond organ into her compositions. This performance by Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames is brimming with blues and soulful sounds that will delight the groups old and new fans.

programme.title: SHYRE live at Festival Vue sur la Relève
programme.desc: SHYRE is the creative collaboration launched by Montreal-born vocalist and pianist Sarah Rossy. This five-member group mixes instrumental textures with ethereal ambience, taking the listener on a journey through passages of prose with unique aesthetics. SHYRE fuses pop-folk and jazz with symphonic timbres, and psychedelic ambience, employing lush strings, dynamic rhythms, and angelic harmonies. The resulting soundscape is innocent, yet fascinating. Sail away on the aural wings of music from their debut album New Year (2013).

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: A Tango Night - Live from Buenos Aires
programme.desc: 2006 closed with a spectacular festival of Argentinean music broadcast live from Buenos Aires. At the height of the Argentinean summer, the Orquesta Filarmonica del Teatro Colon under Daniel Barenboim (conductor and soloist) join bandoneon virtuoso Leopoldo Federico and his Orquesta Tipica for an extraordinary New Years Eve show with popular tangos and Latin American orchestra classics. The old master of tango, Jose Carli, created enchanting new arrangements of works by Argentinean artists Astor Piazzolla, Carlos Gardel, Julio de Caro, Alberto Ginastera and Horacio Salgán. Performances by leading tango dancers Mora Godoy and Junior Cervilla from Buenos Aires add atmosphere and round off the night.

programme.desc: Sharonat painavad hallutsinatsioonid verisest mehest, kellele on kruvikeeraja kõrva torgatud. Kuna keegi teine meest ei nae, peab Sharona olukorda narvivapustuseks ning võtab puhkust. programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Itaalia versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Vallalised lembelaeval
programme.desc: Allesjaanud viis paarikest on Itaalia oliiviistanduses, kus nad võistlevad oma kehadega õlipudelite taitmises.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Saarelisi ootab ees spordipaev ja Olivial ning Maxwellil on uudiseid.

programme.title: Lagle rannakud
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm Eesti uhiskonnategelasest, kunagisest poliitvangist ja vaga erilisest naisest Lagle Parekust. Tema rannak algab 1941. aastal ja jõuab valja tanapaeva. Lagle Pareki esimene reis viis teda juba lapseeas koos perega kuuditatuna Siberisse ning aastakumneid hiljem poliitvangina Mordva vangilaagrisse. Nendest sundmustest hoolimata ei meenuta Lagle seda aega kui kannatuste rada, vaid pigem kui seiklust. Parek on ideaalne eeskuju mõistmaks, kuidas kõikide raskuste puhul saab jaada inimeseks. See on lugu inimese olemusest ja kirest elada. Sealjuures Lagle ei vasi kordamast oma ema tarkust: "Pole vahet, kus sa elad, peaasi, et sa inimeseks jaad".

programme.title: Armastus, armastus, armastus
programme.desc: Kokku- ja labipõimunud jutustus kolmest loost, mis raagivad abielupaaride ja sõprade vahelisest armastusest, puhendumisest ja lojaalsusest.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Tiim otsib kokku põnevaid fakte mõnede roogade kohta, mida britid valjast tellida armastavad. Jimmy Doherty on Tais avastamas uht kevadrullide ootamatut komponenti ja siis suundub Indiasse, kus saab teada, mis valjast tellitud karri nii maitsvaks teeb. Amanda Byram ja selgitab valja, miks tekitab mõni tass kohvi rohkem suminat kui teine ning Andi Oliver uurib, kuidas valmivad doner kebabid.

programme.title: Jamie vahemerelised road
programme.desc: Marseillei hõrkudest mereandidest ja Provencei maitsekullastest kõhutaitest inspireeritud Jamie valmistab steiki ja krõbekartuleid Marseillei moodi ning suvikõrvitsa, kitsejuustu ja oliivipasta pirukat.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: 21-aastane Bianca on tudeng Sydneyst uhe barjaariga - ta on veel suutu. Tema kaaslane, 21-aastane Christian on Melbourneis elav kreeklane. Zoe on 23-aastane ettevõtja, kes saadetakse kohtingule merejalavaelase Mattiga. Harry hindab spontaansust ja Lyndal saab tema huumorist aru. Angelina ja Josh vahetavad oma rajusid kogemusi kohtingutega. Jazz on valmis uuesti armastust leidma - kas Garethiga?

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Jasmine ja Ryan, olles leidnud uhise keele audioraamatute ja sarnaste fitness-eesmarkide naol, otsustavad nad teiselegi kohtingule minna. Toitumisnõustajat Jenniferi võlub Inglise poisi Edi võrukaelasarm. Veokijuht Jakei ja farmi abitoolist Rebeccat uhendavad vaated steikidele ja mulletitele. Karen tahab luksust, Abdul aga minema saada. Neil teist kohtingut ei tule.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Ashleigh võlub Kylei oma julgete kaikudega ja nad suudlevad esimesel kohtingul. Disney-fann Megan otsib oma unistuste printsi, kohvirostija Dale selleks ei osutu. Strippar Victor leiab uhise keele kuue lapse ema Danielleiga ja teeb talle tasuta suletantsu. Suzanneil ja Rayl on uhine kultuur, aga omavahelist sadet mitte. James on salaparane, kuid mitte midagi enamat. Abbyle see ei sobi.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Poissmees laheb allesjaanud nelja daami kodulinnadesse, et kohtuda nende peredega ning võimalikult hasti nende igapaevaeludest sotti saada.

programme.title: Koju tagasi iga tee kord viib
programme.desc: Romantikafilm! Kantrimuusik Charlotte on peagi abiellumas. Enne tahtsat sundmust sõidab naine kunagisse kodulinna, et laenutada oma vanaema pulmakleiti. Tuttavatel radadel kaies kohtab Charlotte oma kooliaegset kallimat ja malestused hakkavad taaselustuma. Korraga taitub naise suda kahtlustega, kas ta ikka on end sidumas õige kaaslasega.

programme.title: Sudame roovel
programme.desc: Asjaarmastajast ehtekunstnik Melissa palgatakse arusaamatuse tagajarjel suure ehtefirmasse looma pruudikollektsiooni koostoos firma tegevjuhi poja Jakeiga, kes kõike liiga tõsiselt võtab. Nad alustavad oma koostood vastumeelselt, aga see teekond viib valja enamani kui lihtsalt koos tootamiseni.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" sõidab labi kõik Ühendkuningriigi nurgad, et saada selgust, mis teeb kodumaised toidud nii eriliseks. Andi Oliver uurib puuviljajook Pimmsi telgitaguseid, Jimmy Doherty aga Carribbean Jerki maitsesegu maitsmisnaarmetele. Jimmy selgitab valja, millised Briti õunad kupsetamiseks sobivad. Kate Quilton kohtub Briti pudrutšempioniga ja Matt Tebbutt saab teada, milline aadikas kala juurde sobib.

programme.title: Jamie hooajalised road
programme.desc: Jamie toob esile rabarberi, lisades sellele hõrgu kastme, ja valmistab spinatit siidise kitsejuustuga.

27-aastasel Adam Lerneril naib olevat kõik, mida uks hing ihkab - tal on seksikas ja andekas kunstnikust kallim, fantastiline too. Adamit tabab aga piinav seljavalu ning ta saab teada, et põeb uliharuldast ning tõenaoliselt surmaga lõppevat vahivormi.

programme.title: Ma naen su haalt
programme.desc: Tippklassi meelelahutussaates "Ma naen su haalt" osaleval arvajapaaril tuleb tundmatute seast eristada imelise lauluoskusega inimesed andekatest teesklejatest, kes aga uldse laulda ei oska. Arvajatele on abiks nõunike kogu, kus on koha sisse võtnud komoodianaitleja Tõnis Niinemets, kes enda sõnul suisa naudib, kui teda haneks tõmmatakse. Lisaks temale jagavad arvajatele taibukaid tahelepanekuid meelelahutaja Grete Kuld, naitleja Evelin Võigemast ja juutuuber ning muusik Andrei Zevakin. Kulalisnõuniku tooli istub seekord armastatud laulja Elina Nechayeva.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus Saksamaa
programme.desc: Saates astub lavale kaks vallalist, kel avaneb võimalus valida unelmate kaaslane. Tulevase kohtingupartneri nagu ei nae kumbki saatekulaline, kuid see-eest on nende ees valla paljad kehad.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus Saksamaa
programme.desc: Saates astub lavale kaks vallalist, kel avaneb võimalus valida unelmate kaaslane. Tulevase kohtingupartneri nagu ei nae kumbki saatekulaline, kuid see-eest on nende ees valla paljad kehad.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Itaalia versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Üks õnnelik paar saab õiguse pelgupaika kasutada, kuid teisi ootab uus valjakutse.

programme.title: Salzburgi jutustus
programme.desc: Muinasjutuline armastuse lugu, mida 70-aastane vanaema oma lapselapsele jutustab ning mis raagib noorest Austria heliloojast, kelle maailm poordub peapeale, kui tema ellu saabub muretu ameeriklanna.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" sõidab labi kõik Ühendkuningriigi nurgad, et saada selgust, mis teeb kodumaised toidud nii eriliseks. Andi Oliver uurib puuviljajook Pimmsi telgitaguseid, Jimmy Doherty aga Carribbean Jerki maitsesegu maitsmisnaarmetele. Jimmy selgitab valja, millised Briti õunad kupsetamiseks sobivad. Kate Quilton kohtub Briti pudrutšempioniga ja Matt Tebbutt saab teada, milline aadikas kala juurde sobib.

programme.title: Jamie hooajalised road
programme.desc: Jamie toob esile rabarberi, lisades sellele hõrgu kastme, ja valmistab spinatit siidise kitsejuustuga.

programme.title: Hooaeg
programme.desc: Saade annab vastused mitmetele kusimustele: Millised on uued kaubamargid Eesti turul naha- ja kehahoolduses, dekoratiivkosmeetikas ning juuksemaailmas? Milliseid tooteid kasutada kodus ning miks tasub minna ennast turgutama ilusalongi? Millised on uued rõiva- ja jalatsikollektsioonid kiirelt arenevas moemaailmas? Millist rõivastust endale valida? Millised on ehtemaailma uudised? Elustiili osas avardavad silmaringi lastega seotud teemad, lemmikloomad, autod, toitlustuskohad, erinevad puhkuse veetmise võimalused nagu spaad ja treeningklubid, muuseumid ja uued raamatud.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Lihaseline Taite ei peta Dee ootusi - õhus lendab sademeid ja sargid lendavad seljast. Josh ja Chris muljetavad chorizo ja sudamevalu ule. Sophiel tekib hea klapp tatoveeritud Daniga, samas kui Sophie ema Peta flirdib Zaciga, kes kahjuks aga asjaga kaasa ei lahe. James teeb uue katse Rebeccaga, kes algul teeskleb talle korviandmist, kuid lõpuks siiski "jah" utleb ja ta õnnelikuks teeb.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Tomi ja Kelly vahel sutitavad sademe naer piinlike hetkede ule ja sarnased kogemused vabakutselise elust. Nohiklike hingesugulaste Stephanie ja Matti sidemele saab saatuslikuks pikk vahemaa. Peta hakkab Desiga taas kelmikalt juttu puhuma, aga lõpuks annab siiski talle korvi. Rochelle ja Reggie leiavad uhise keele võimukate Fidži emade teemal ja lepivad kokku ka teise kohtingu osas.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton kohtub oma varasemate silmarõõmudega, et sirgeks raakida kõik õhku jaanud arusaamatused ning erimeelsused.

programme.title: Taitunud sunnipaevasoov
programme.desc: Oma 30. sunnipaeva õhtul soovib keskkonnakaitsja Lindsay Corwin, et kõik tema elu sunnipaevasoovid laheksid taide. Kas need soovid aga tõepoolest vastavad sellele, mida ta pariselt tahab?

27-aastasel Adam Lerneril naib olevat kõik, mida uks hing ihkab - tal on seksikas ja andekas kunstnikust kallim, fantastiline too. Adamit tabab aga piinav seljavalu ning ta saab teada, et põeb uliharuldast ning tõenaoliselt surmaga lõppevat vahivormi.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Supertoitude erisaates on midagi kogu perele. Matt Tebbutt katsetab jarele vaiteid keefiri tervislikkuse kohta, Amanda Byram uurib, kas uks igas kapis leiduv toit aitab teismelistel paremini õppida, Jimmy Doherty selgitab valja granaatõuna tõhususe Alzheimeri tõve ennetusel, Briony May Williams saab teada, kuidas kala allergikuid aitab ning Kate Quilton uurib kofeiini kasutust enneaegsete laste ravis.

programme.title: Jamie hooajalised road

programme.desc: Mike satub oma kolleegidega viktoriaanlikku paralleelmaailma, kus ta peab lahendama Brokenwoodi aurupungi uritusel toimunud mõrva.

programme.title: Keisrinna
programme.desc: Katariina lein Leo kaotamise parast ulestõusu ajal jõuab talle lõpuks kohale. Peetri roll Leo surmas ja asjaolu, et ta oli just aadliku mõrvanud, nõuavad karistust. Katariina paneb Peetri koos tema mumifitseeritud emaga luku taha.

programme.title: Keisrinna
programme.desc: Osmanite suursaadik teeb Katariina juurde visiidi, kuna piirkondade vahel on suured pinged.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Itaalia versioon omanaolisest kohtingusaatest, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Saarelised peavad sotti saama eelmisest valjakutsest õhku jaanud kusimuste ja kahtluste osas.

programme.title: Brokenwoodi mõrvad
programme.desc: Mike satub oma kolleegidega viktoriaanlikku paralleelmaailma, kus ta peab lahendama Brokenwoodi aurupungi uritusel toimunud mõrva.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Austini osariigis Texase osariigis elav perekond puuab alustada uut elu, kui on jaanud parast majanduslangust oma kodust ilma. Perekond suudab lahedaste abiga uletada kõik tagasiloogid ning ja luua kauni kodu, mida nad võivad nimetada enda omaks.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Piret ja Kertu ei kiida Mari ootamatut otsust heaks. Piret kardab, et Volts ei tahagi enam last. Erik korraldab Kertule ootamatu stseeni. Sirje survestab Urmast uhist ari alustama. Gunnar saab Sirje plaanidest teada ning tagajarjed ei lase end oodata.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Fernando loodab, et ta plaan tootab. Adela annab Elsale võimaluse. Irene otsustab Julietat ja Saúli aidata.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Tomi ja Kelly vahel sutitavad sademe naer piinlike hetkede ule ja sarnased kogemused vabakutselise elust. Nohiklike hingesugulaste Stephanie ja Matti sidemele saab saatuslikuks pikk vahemaa. Peta hakkab Desiga taas kelmikalt juttu puhuma, aga lõpuks annab siiski talle korvi. Rochelle ja Reggie leiavad uhise keele võimukate Fidži emade teemal ja lepivad kokku ka teise kohtingu osas.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Leah valjastab tõsise hoiatuse. Lacey tussab Gagei ja Tane avaldab vastupanu.

programme.title: Vallaline kaunitar
programme.desc: Gabby ja Rachel mõlemad kulastavad oma kavaleride kodulinnasid. Kuna potentsiaalsed kihlused on juba silmapiiril, puuavad kaunitarid peredega kohtumisi maksimaalselt ara kasutada.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Hingelt noor vanaema tahab parast lotovõitu endale poppi ja noorteparast maja. David Bromsted aitab tal leida kodu, mis oleks piisavalt suur, et pere võõrustada, aga piisavalt vaike, et seal uksi elada.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Identsed kaksikud panevad Tennessee vaikelinnas toime jõhkraid runnakuid ning vennad muutuvad iga kuriteoga aina julgemaks.

programme.title: Laskur
programme.desc: Bob Lee leiab Isaacu Texasest parast seda, kui talle oli tehtud mõrvakatse; Nadine saab teada, kui mõjuvõimas Patricia Gregson on; Julie puuab oma pere jaoks tugev pusida.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Jess Chobot ja Phil Torres uurivad Kaskaadides asuvat vrakipaika, kus vaidetavalt kummitavad inimeste vaimud, kes kaotasid elu uhes Ameerika ajaloo ohvriterohkemas rongiõnnetuses.

programme.title: Roheline Vapsik
programme.desc: Komoodia muretust playboyst Britt Reidst, kelle senine elu on olnud uks lõputu lust ja lillepidu, kuid seda hetkeni, mil ta isa ootamatult sureb ning jatab pojale tohutu meediaimpeeriumi. Reid naeb selles võimalust teha lõpuks ka midagi head ja otsustab oma isa kummalise alluva Katoga vastu hakata linnas vohavale kuritegevusele, kuid seda pisut isearalikul moel - kaitsta seadust seda rikkudes. Mehest saab maskis tasuja Roheline Vapsik, kes asub koos Katoga oistel tanavatel korda majja looma. Selline tegutsemisviis hairib aga suurt maffiabossi, kes võtab nuud omakorda sihikule tuutu Rohelise Vapsiku, et ta oma teelt kõrvaldada.

programme.title: NASA mõistatused
programme.desc: Selles "NASA mõistatuste" osas: Mis juhtub, kui Marss arkab? Kas Roswelli lendava taldriku juhtum võis olla Jossif Stalini katetoo? FBI sulgeb mõistatuslikul põhjusel kumneks paevaks Sunspoti paikeseobservatooriumi. NASA katsetused loomade talveune režiimiga, et saata inimastronaudid kosmosesse. Salaparane sustikut jalgiv kosmoselaev paastab meeskonna katastroofist.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kuldvillak
programme.desc: Eesti armastatuim malumang pakub põnevat kaasaelamist ja võimalust ka kodus kaasa nuputada. Saatejuht Eeva Esse.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Indias
programme.desc: Parast vasitavat ja rahvarohket Delhi linna jõuavad kaks kanget tõelisse paradiisiranda - Varkalasse. Kuid, kui uhes matkaseltskonnas on inimesi juba rohkem kui uks, siis on erimeelsused ideaalsest oobimiskohast ning rannapuhkusest kerged tekkima. Õnneks suudavad kuldsed liivad ja India ookeani romantiline kohin vahemalt hetkeks pingeid leevendada. Paraku on reisigraafik tihe ning juba jargmisel paeval tuleb esimest korda vastamisi seista India rongiliiklusega. Saatejuhid Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Saatejuhid saavad ulesande muuta autod sotsiaalmeedia abiga noortele atraktiivsemaks. Kellel õnnestub kõige rohkem paparatsosid kokku meelitada? Eboladroomil võtavad mõõtu 8ondate Itaalia superautod Ferrari testarossa ja Lamborghini Countach LP5000. Kolmik selgitab valja ka parima uue kiire luukpara - VW Polo GTI.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Vennad Carrid saabuvad Kansase osariiki Wichitasse, kavatsedes toime panna roovimisi, kuid nende plaanid eskaleeruvad kiiresti mõrvade jadaks, milletaolist pole Kansases enne nahtud.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Kui mees leitakse oma baarist jõhkralt mõrvatuna, avaneb aastate jooksul varjul olnud mõrvamusteerium. Uurijad usuvad, et tegemist on nurja lainud aritehinguga ja peavad juhtumi lahendamiseks sellele vankumatult puhenduma.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Eliitne erakool satub tule alla seoses aastakumnete taguste õpilaste kaebustega neid seksuaalselt vaarkohelnud õpetajate kohta. Kui suureks ohvrite ja rundajate arv kasvada võib? Ja kui sugavale ulatuvad nende sundmuste varjamise juured?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: "Valge raev" pani 2015. aastal Charlestoni nooruki mõrvama uheksa mustanahalist kirikukulastajat ja kaivitab plaani Kansases moslemitest pagulaste tapmiseks. Ametivõimud tahavad teada, kui kaugele see kõik minna võib.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Tulsas Oklas lastakse maha mees, kui tapja naeb võimalust, mis on liiga hea, et seda kasutamata jatta. Atlantas viib ule kate lainud tuli uhe mehe surmani ja teise mehe ohtu sattumiseni.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Parklas toimunud uimastitehing paadib kahe Atlanta mehe elu nõudva tulevahetusega ja Tulsa kulje all Okla motellis toime pandud hukkamisstiilis tapmine viib edasi veel uhe mõrvani, kui tapja avastab, et tema teol oli pealtnagija.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Tulsas suutu vanamemme tapmine kaivitab uurija John Browni võidujooksu ajaga. Kas selle traagilise sundmuse taga võis olla uks teismeliste seltskond?

programme.title: James May
programme.desc: Et kõik teed viivad alati Rooma, oli paratamatus, et ka James May jõuab lõpuks valja Itaalia vagevasse pealinna. Kuid ta ei piirdu seal ainult roomlaste ja varemetega, vaid istub ka bussile, kohtab teist versiooni iseendast ja uurib midagi, mis on liiga pisike, et seda nahagi.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Ringreis viib kolmiku Gruusiasse ja aserbaidžaani. Enam kui 1000-km teekond viib nad Mustast merest Kaspia pereni ja toob valja valitud autode - Aston Martin DBS Superleggera, Bentley Continental GT ja uue 8. seeria BMW tugevused ja nõrkused. Katse tõestab, et tavaliikluses on autode kiirusevahe olematu.

programme.title: Kutsuge McCall
programme.desc: McCall puuab leida sarimõrvari poolt roovitud naist, kelle varasemad kuriteod jaid avastamata. McCalli ootavad ees probleemid, kui ta satub oma valvsa tegevuse tõttu Manhattani ringkonnaprokurori Avery Graftoni radarile.

programme.title: 7 võõrast El Royaleis
programme.desc: Seitse võõrast, kellest igauhel on riidekapis rohkesti luukeresid ja samuti valgustkartvaid saladusi, mida maha matta, kohtuvad paevinainud ja tumeda moodanikuga El Royalei hotellis. Ühe saatusliku oo jooksul avaneb kõigil seitsmel võimalus oma pattudele lunastust saada.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. Paraku on reisigraafik tihe ning juba jargmisel paeval tuleb esimest korda vastamisi seista India rongiliiklusega. Saatejuhid Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna.

programme.title: Motomelu
programme.desc: "Saates teeme juttu autodest, mootorratastest ja kõigest muust, mis liigub mootori jõul. Uudised, proovisõidud, erinevad masinad ja lood inimestest, kes hoiavad tehnikamaailma elus - see on saade kõigile, keda koidavad mootorid ja masinad." Saatejuht Kairi Rondo.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Politseisaade.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter+" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kas loome kaed?
programme.desc: Tõeline telemangude klassika, kus mangus osalejal ei ole vaja malumangu teadmisi või fuusilisi oskuseid. Mang kaib raha ja auhindade peale. On vaja vaid natukene õnne, et teha õige otsus! Kas valida saatejuhi poolt pakutav rahasumma või salaparane kingitus? Kas jaada oma otsusele kindlaks või proovida oma õnne veelgi suurema võidu nimel? "Kas loome kaed?" kusib alati rõõmsameelne ja šarmantne saatejuht Robert Rool.

programme.title: Kuldvillak
programme.desc: Eesti armastatuim malumang pakub põnevat kaasaelamist ja võimalust ka kodus kaasa nuputada. Saatejuht Eeva Esse.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Indias
programme.desc: Cochini linnas on kangetel matkajatel võimalik lahedalt vaadata uht õige omaparast kalapuugi meetodit. Teet aga otsustab õhtul nautida ehedat India teatrit. Kuid vaatamata selle, et entusiastlik saatejuht on uhkeks kultuurisundmuseks teoreetiliselt kõvasti valmistunud, ootab teda ees tõeline kultuurishokk. Juba jargmisel paeval jatkub seiklus Mumbais koos ekstreemse paadiretke, slummide, hiiglasliku kasipesula ning Varaste turuga. Saatejuhid Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: Ringreis viib kolmiku Gruusiasse ja aserbaidžaani. Enam kui 1000-km teekond viib nad Mustast merest Kaspia pereni ja toob valja valitud autode - Aston Martin DBS Superleggera, Bentley Continental GT ja uue 8. seeria BMW tugevused ja nõrkused. Katse tõestab, et tavaliikluses on autode kiirusevahe olematu.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: 1991. aasta suvel kulvavad poolõde-vend Lõuna-Californias paanikat, kui nad asuvad sooritama juhuslikke kuritegusid, mille sihtmargiks on inimesed, kes teevad igapaevaseid toid.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Seitsme kuu jooksul panevad kolm venda Richmondi linnas toime jarjest vagivaldsemaid ja jõhkramaid kuritegusid, jattes maha suure hulga laipu. Isegi parast tabamist on neid vendi raske ohjes hoida.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Peruus Limas kaob poliitiku tutar parast peoõhtut valjas. Meest, kelle seltsis teda viimati nahti, seostatakse uhe noore ameeriklanna kadumisega 4500 km kaugusel. Milliste võigaste skeemidega ta tegeleb?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Naine kuuleb mehest, kes teda ulikoolis runnanud oli ning otsustab ta vastutusele võtta. 30 aastat hiljem kõneleb uks sama ulikooli õpilane rabavalt sarnasest kokkupuutest. Uurijad avastavad šokeeriva tõe.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Noor kultuskirjanik JT Leroy on teinud peadpooritava tõusu kirjandustaevasse. Kuid tema kaitumine muutub sedamooda veidramaks, mida rohkem ta raamatuid muunud on. Kas on talle kuulsus pahe loonud või toimub kulisside taga midagi sootuks hamarat?

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Kui Atlantas lastakse nooruk maha 80 m kauguselt, paljastab uurija Darrin Smith vihavaenu, millel on oht kogu naabruskond lõhestada.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Kui 90-aastast sõjakangelast tulistatakse selga, tuleb valja, et võti juhtunu asjaolude valjaselgitamiseks võib olla tema endise naabri kaes ning uhe noore mehe tulevik katkeb jarsult, kui plaan kiiret tulu teenida rappa laheb.

programme.title: James May
programme.desc: James paneb Firenzes proovile oma renessansiajastu mehe võimed spordialal, mis hõlmab kunsti, teadust ja alkeemiat. Emilia ja Romagna tutvuvad kiirelt liikuvate autode ja aeglaselt laagerduvate juustude maailmaga ning James leiab end viimaks veidral kombel tuttavana tunduvast linnast.

programme.title: Grand Tour
programme.desc: May teeb Porsche 917 50. sunnipaeva puhul ulevaate selle kuulsusrikkast ajaloost. Eboladroomil on vastamisi kaks kaasaegset Lanciat - Delta Futurista ja Stratos MAT. Clarkson ja Hammond proovivad kiirendada lennujaama askeldusi motoriseeritud kohvritega.

programme.title: Raport
programme.desc: Idealistlik USA senati ametnik Daniel J. Jones saab ulesande juhtida CIA 11. septembri jargset kinnipidamis- ja ulekuulamisprogrammi uurimist, paljastades šokeerivad saladused.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Eliitne erakool satub tule alla seoses aastakumnete taguste õpilaste kaebustega neid seksuaalselt vaarkohelnud õpetajate kohta. Kui suureks ohvrite ja rundajate arv kasvada võib? Ja kui sugavale ulatuvad nende sundmuste varjamise juured?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: "Valge raev" pani 2015. aastal Charlestoni nooruki mõrvama uheksa mustanahalist kirikukulastajat ja kaivitab plaani Kansases moslemitest pagulaste tapmiseks. Ametivõimud tahavad teada, kui kaugele see kõik minna võib.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Peruus Limas kaob poliitiku tutar parast peoõhtut valjas. Meest, kelle seltsis teda viimati nahti, seostatakse uhe noore ameeriklanna kadumisega 4500 km kaugusel. Milliste võigaste skeemidega ta tegeleb?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Naine kuuleb mehest, kes teda ulikoolis runnanud oli ning otsustab ta vastutusele võtta. 30 aastat hiljem kõneleb uks sama ulikooli õpilane rabavalt sarnasest kokkupuutest. Uurijad avastavad šokeeriva tõe.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Noor kultuskirjanik JT Leroy on teinud peadpooritava tõusu kirjandustaevasse. Kuid tema kaitumine muutub sedamooda veidramaks, mida rohkem ta raamatuid muunud on. Kas on talle kuulsus pahe loonud või toimub kulisside taga midagi sootuks hamarat?

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter+" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Indias
programme.desc: Cochini linnas on kangetel matkajatel võimalik lahedalt vaadata uht õige omaparast kalapuugi meetodit. Teet aga otsustab õhtul nautida ehedat India teatrit. Kuid vaatamata selle, et entusiastlik saatejuht on uhkeks kultuurisundmuseks teoreetiliselt kõvasti valmistunud, ootab teda ees tõeline kultuurishokk. Juba jargmisel paeval jatkub seiklus Mumbais koos ekstreemse paadiretke, slummide, hiiglasliku kasipesula ning Varaste turuga. Saatejuhid Kristjan Jõekalda ja Teet Margna.

programme.title: Raport
programme.desc: Idealistlik USA senati ametnik Daniel J. Jones saab ulesande juhtida CIA 11. septembri jargset kinnipidamis- ja ulekuulamisprogrammi uurimist, paljastades šokeerivad saladused.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Jess Chobot ja Phil Torres uurivad Kaskaadides asuvat vrakipaika, kus vaidetavalt kummitavad inimeste vaimud, kes kaotasid elu uhes Ameerika ajaloo ohvriterohkemas rongiõnnetuses.

programme.title: Jalg
programme.desc: Ajame jalgi seal, kus kohtuvad vanad kusimused ja uued lahendused. Heidi kaib uurimas, kui palju sooja annab igapaevane andmete liigutamine. Marko on aga taas mere aares ja paneb kaed kulge uhe Eesti vaikesadama ehitusele. Marksa suuremas sadamas saab aga aimu sellest, kuidas tootab mereprugipuudur.

programme.title: Motomelu
programme.desc: "Saates teeme juttu autodest, mootorratastest ja kõigest muust, mis liigub mootori jõul. Uudised, proovisõidud, erinevad masinad ja lood inimestest, kes hoiavad tehnikamaailma elus - see on saade kõigile, keda koidavad mootorid ja masinad." Saatejuht Kairi Rondo.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter+" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bundydele kukub sulle ootamatu parandus ning nad otsustavad peenesse restorani õhtust sooma minna.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kelly koolis toimub ema-tutrepaev, kus Peggy jagab meelsasti oma rahakulutamise oskusi ja kogemusi.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Identsed kaksikud panevad Tennessee vaikelinnas toime jõhkraid runnakuid ning vennad muutuvad iga kuriteoga aina julgemaks.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael laheb teistesse buroodesse Scrantoni edust kõnelema, Pam autojuhiks kaasas. Uticas laheb kõne lorri, kuid Pam lepib ara abiellunud ja rasedaks jaanud Kareniga. Seepeale sõidab Michael Nashuasse, et Hollyga ara leppida.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Pami vanematel on abieluprobleemid ja nad lahevad lahku, kui Pami isa kuuleb, kui vaga Jim Pami armastab. Michael laseb tervel kontoril enda ule nalja visata, kuid solvub naljade peale.

programme.title: Vallaline purjus naisterahvas
programme.desc: Parast verstaposti tahistamist otsustab Sam, et on aeg Caroliga ara leppida. Tuli Joeliga paneb Briti uuesti tulevikku vaatama ning ta poordub abi saamiseks Felicia poole. James varjab kohutavat saladust.

programme.title: Vallaline purjus naisterahvas
programme.desc: Uue tookoha ja uue potentsiaalse armusuhtega Sam arvab, et ta elu on tahistamist vaart ja korraldab sunnipaevapeo. Brit puuab kõiki veenda, et temal ja Joelil oli "taiuslik lahutus".

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Christy on uksikema, kes parast alkoholismi ja narkosõltuvusega võitlemist otsutab teha oma elule restardi. Ta alustab tood ettekandjana, kaib korraparaselt AA kohtumistel kohal ning elu tundub õigel teel olevat, kuniks tema ellu ja majja trugib tagasi tema ema Bonnie.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Nadja vampiiride ooklubi avaõhtu on ohus, kui suur muusikastaar tuhistab esinemise.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Vampiirid võtavad ette reisi salajasele ooturule, kuhu kogunevad kõik uleloomulikud olendid bartertehinguteks ja kauplemiseks.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Vampiirid kogevad erakooli sisseastumisvestluse protsessi.

programme.desc: Guillermo hullub, puudes aidata Nandoril planeeridaideaalset vampiiripulma.

programme.title: Vallaline purjus naisterahvas
programme.desc: Ebamugav kohtumine oma endise parima sõbra ja tema eksiga sunnib Sami oma minevikuvigu tunnistama. Kui ta on emaga suhte taastanud, saab Sam oma ullatuseks teada, et ta ema kaib kohtamas.

programme.title: Vallaline purjus naisterahvas
programme.desc: Sam puuab Briti usaldust võita, tehes oma sunnipaevapeol heastu. Kui Sami kriminaalhooldusametnik labi astub, naeb Carol vaeva, et Sami "olukorda" oma sõpradele selgitada.

programme.desc: Sam seisab silmitsi oma seni raskeima ulesandega, milleks on Puha Patricku paeval kaine olemine. Brit ja Sam saavad ootamatu võimaluse oma sõprus taastada. James ja Mindy leiavad Puha Patricku paeva kiusatustega võideldes kadunud võtmed ules.

programme.desc: Ray kingib Frankile 65. sunnipaevaks akvaariumi.

programme.desc: Ray ja Debra lahevad Ray koolikokkutulekule.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Marie on viimaks Debra viimase piirini viinud ning Debra kirjutab talle kirja selle kohta, mida ta temast pariselt arvab.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Ray tahab jõulupuhadel Debraga seksida.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Frank lavastab sõpradega kodusõja stseene, Ray soovib neid aidata.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Alan vaevleb unetuse kaes ja laheb oosel randa jooksma. Kui see lõpeb katastroofiga, poordub ta unetuse lahendamiseks psuhhiaatri poole. Jake anub Charliet, et too ei hakkaks kaima ta klassikaaslase seksika emaga.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Topeltkohtingu ajal viskab Charliel ule, et Alan pidevalt raha laenab ja "jargmine kord" arve lubab maksta. Charlie uritab Alani ule trumbata. Jake proovib, mis tunne on uksi kodus olla.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charlie peab valima oma uue pruudi Lydia ja Berta vahel, sest naised ei saa omavahel uldse labi. Alan uritab muua kalli korteri, mille nad Kandiga ostsid, aga Kandi uritab teda eksiteele viia.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charlie sooviks jõuluõhtu oma kaaslasega kahekesi veeta, aga kutsumata sõpru ja sugulasi sajab sisse uksest ja aknast. Evelyn uritab Charlie uue suhte kiiremas korras purustada, segadust kulvavad ka Charlie kaaslase ema ja Judithi uus kallim.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Kui Berta avastab, et Alan on salamisi tema tutre Naomiga kohtamas kainud, ootab Alan suuri pahandusi. Aga Berta reaktsioon on ullatavam ja hullem, kui Alan oskas aimatagi.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Holly saadetakse toole Nashuasse ja Michael aitab tal teise osariiki kolida. Pam kohtub Jimi vendadega, kes viskavad Jimile piinliku vembu. Dwight kiusab Andyt Cornelli ulikooli fanniks hakates.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Dwight ja Jim on rabatud, kui saavad klienditeeninduse eest halba tagasisidet. Selgub, et Kelly on tulemused saboteerinud, sest nad ei kainud tema "Ameerika talendi" peol.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael saadetakse tooasjus Winnipegi. Andy ja Oscar sõidavad kaasa ja saavad ootamatult sõpradeks, kui nad purjus peaga Angelale helistavad. Jim loeb paevi, millal Pam kunstikoolist tagasi tuleb.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Toby tuleb Costa Ricast tagasi ja ajab Michaeli hulluks. Tema ja Dwight uritavad Tobyle sule sappa anda talle "uimasteid" sahtlisse sokutades. Jim ullatab Pami oma vanemate vana maja ostes. Ryan jatab Kelly maha, et sõita Taisse.

programme.title: Kontor

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earl teeb heateo nimekirjas olnud astronaudile, kes juhib kosmoseakadeemiat, kuid avastab seejuures, et mees on petis. Samas selgub, et inimene, kellena ta esineb, pole samuti parem.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earl uritab leppida Camdeni nõiamooriga, kuid see ainult arritab naist ja ta võtab pantvangi kõik, kes on talle kunagi liiga teinud.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Randy avastab, et ta lapsepõlvearmastus Pinky oli tegelikult Joy ja Earl rikkus isekatel põhjustel nende suhte.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Randy avastab, et ta lapsepõlvearmastus Pinky oli tegelikult Joy ja Earl rikkus isekatel põhjustel nende suhte.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earli katsed aidata pastorit, kes esineb ta nimekirjas mitu korda, viivad kirikumehe tagasi kuritegelikule teele. Joy sõidab Catalinale murutraktoriga otsa.

programme.title: Halvim lemmikõps
programme.desc: Jack vihastab avastades, et õpilased on varastanud tema kalli Harvardi sulepea, kuigi ta oli palunud neil seda mitte puutuda. Direktor Durbin ja Helen kukuvad korduvalt inspektori kontrollides labi.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Brooklyni politsei 99. jaoskonda tuleb uus juht Raymond Holt, kes erinevalt eelmisest juhist suhtub toosse vaga tõsiselt. See valmistab suurt meeleharmi jaoskonna tootajatele - andekale, ent muretule uurijale Jacob Peraltale (Andy Samberg) ja pedantlikule Amy Santiagole (Melissa Fumero). Uurija Charles Boyle uritab samas kutsuda kohtama lakoonilist Rosa Diazi.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Kui Jake toole hilineb, sokutab Holt talle grafitikunstniku puudmise toootsa, kuid Jake peab seda endale alandavaks. Kuid siis selgub, et kahtlusalune on asepolitseiulema poeg. Jaoskonda kulastab Gina sensitiivist sõber.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jakeil on kasil palju lahendamata juhtumeid ja keegi ei taha teda aidata, sest nii võib ebaõnn edasi kanduda. Amy kutsub Rosa ja Gina appi, kui Holt saadab ta riskinoorte programmiga tegelema.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake flirdib kuriteopaigas ilusa kohtueksperdiga ja seeparast jaab lahkamisraport venima. Politsei kunstnik on haiguslehe võtnud, kuid selgub, et Jeffordsil on kunstnikuannet.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack kaivitab Devon Banksi abiga plaani saada Kabletowni tegevjuhiks, Liz saab veel halbu uudiseid lapsendamisagentuurilt ja peaosataitja Tracy biograafilises filmis Harriet Tubmanist osutub Tracy naisversiooniks.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Jack ja Liz lahevad Floridasse, kus nad avastavad Jacki lahkunud ema kohta šokeeriva saladuse ja Hazel kaebab võrgu kohtusse seksuaalse ahistamise eest.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lizi lapsendamistaotlus saab lõpuks heakskiidu, kuid ta on liiga hõivatud, et uksinda paasta TGSi tkinnipanekust. Kenneth puuab aidata Jackil jareltulijat valida .

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liz puuab kohaneda koduperenaise rolliga ja Jack otsib tõelist õnne. Kenneth ja Tracy hkohanevad Kennethi uue ametikohaga NBC presidendina.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Naitlejad ja meeskond tulevad kokku, et teha TGSi viimane episood.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Guillermo vajab haarberi korrastamise alustamiseks raha ja puuab eebi Colinilt krediitkaardi PIN-koodi saada. Nadja kuulutab, et parim viis raha teenida onavada vampiiride ooklubi.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Guillermole tuleb ullatuskulaline valismaalt; Laszlo otsustab juhtida beebi Colini karjaari ja esitab Nadjale uue lepingu.

programme.desc: Beebi Colin tunneb end taiskasvanud mehe kehas ebamugavalt ning Lazlo ja Guillermo naevad vaeva, et valja mõelda, kuidas teda aidata.

programme.title: Elu pimeduse varjus
programme.desc: Vampiirid tahavad korraldada uhket verepidu oma Vanalt Maalt parit iidse peremehe auks.
